value.string:
Command: IF-Else -> Web Control
Tag Name: IF-Else_WebControl

Usecase 1: Else If Web Control Exists Condition on CheckBox Control
Select Command : Web Control Exists
Specify Website URL/Page : Open New URL : http://ec2-34-217-153-232.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com:8001/Checkbox/Checkbox.html
Control Details : Type : Checkbox | Name : vehicle | Value : unchecked
Wait for the control to exist(in seconds) : 2
Search the control in a page by : Control Name : vehicle | Control Index : 1

Usecase 2: Else If Web Control Exists Condition on CheckBox Control
Select Command : Web Control Exists
Specify Website URL/Page : Select Page : Automation Anywhere Form
Control Details : Type : Checkbox | Name : vehicle | Value : checked
Wait for the control to exist(in seconds) : 2
Search the control in a page by : Control Name : vehicle | Control Index : 1

Usecase 3: Else If Web Control Does Not Exist Condition on CheckBox Control
Select Command : Web Control Does Not Exist
Specify Website URL/Page : Open New URL : http://ec2-34-217-153-232.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com:8001/Checkbox/Checkbox.html
Control Details : Type : Checkbox | Name : vehicle | Value : unchecked
Wait for the control to exist(in seconds) : 2
Search the control in a page by : Control Name : vehicle | Control Index : 100

Usecase 4: Else If Web Control Does Not Exist Condition on CheckBox Control
Select Command : Web Control Does Not Exist
Specify Website URL/Page : Select Page : Automation Anywhere Form
Control Details : Type : Checkbox | Name : vehicle | Value : checked
Wait for the control to exist(in seconds) : 2
Search the control in a page by : Control Name : vehicleabcd | Control Index : 0
